ygData.subject: Twink
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have ben reading these posts and I have a few ideas to share. 1st of all, I believe twinkung is one of those lame things in EQ, I mean c mon, I saw a lvl
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I have ben reading these posts and I have a
few ideas to share. 1st of all, I believe twinkung is
one of those lame things in EQ, I mean c'mon, I saw a
lvl 1 mage with 200 int!<br><br>That's why I switched
to Sullon Zek, only one character per account, so no
twinking unless you own two seperate accounts. <br><br>To
all those newbies who want to pay RL $ for EQ $, why
don't you try out the game first before you twink
yourself. I am a hard-core Role-player, so although I have
a 58 Mage, I will never twink another
character.<br><br>And 1 more thing, to all of you Shaman just starting
out, you can get enough money for Totemic armor, I am
only lvl 18 on Sullon Zek, and I already have 2 pieces
of Totemic. Just work hard and keep those skills
maxed out and you will have a great time in
Everquest.<br><br>Hope this wasn't too long 8)<br><br>Aniir (any
suggestions for a surname?)<br>Barbarian Shaman of the 18th
season<br>Sullon Zek<br>"Thicket and Vale"
